MemoryInfobox.description: 'If Kassandra wanted to meet the Nikolaos|Wolf, she would have to help the Spartans conquer Megaris. And Megaris would be easier to conquer if ther were fewer Athens|Athenian soldiers.'

General_Description: '''One Man Army''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was tasked by [[Stentor]] to eliminate the [[Athens|Athenian]] soldiers in the region to weaken their hold.
Section_Dialogue: Kassandra found and eliminated 20 Athenian soldiers in Megaris.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated a number of Athenian soldiers in Megaris, weakening their strength in the region.
Section_Trivia: Before moving on to [[The Athenian Leader]], [[Crumble and Burn]] and [[The Athenian Treasure Trove]] must also be completed.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
